Ski Patrol

Ano: 1990

Sinopse: The Snowy Peaks ski patrol is one diverse crew. Jerry, the senior member loves skiing and is in love with Ellen, a ski school instructor at Snowy Peaks; Iceman is a singer and a master of impressions; Eddie is the demolition and explosives expert; Stanley has failed to make the patrol seven years in a row; and foreign-exchange patroler Tiana likes Stanley. While having fun and keeping the mountain safe, they try to save the lodge from greedy land developer Sam Maris.—Pat McCurry
